mapper.select: select * from freeboard order by fb_idx desc limit #{start}, #{perpage}
mapper.insert: insert into freeboard (m_idx, fb_subject, fb_content, fb_photo,fb_writeday) VALUES (#{m_idx},#{fb_subject},#{fb_content},#{fb_photo},now())
mapper.update: update freeboard set fb_readcount=fb_readcount+1 where fb_idx=#{fb_idx}

SELECT m.m_photo FROM freeboard fb JOIN member m ON fb.m_idx = m.m_idx WHERE fb.fb_idx = #{fb_idx};
